apis.description: Update multiple modules in an account.

operations.summary: Get current settings for account or course
operations.notes: Update multiple modules in an account.

response_fields.name: inherited
response_fields.description: Whether the current CSP settings are inherited from a parent account.

response_fields.name: settings_locked
response_fields.description: Whether current CSP settings can be overridden by sub-accounts and courses.

response_fields.name: effective_whitelist
response_fields.description:
If enabled, lists the currently allowed domains
(includes domains automatically allowed through external tools).

response_fields.name: tools_whitelist
response_fields.description:
(Account-only) Lists the automatically allowed domains with
their respective external tools

response_fields.name: current_account_whitelist
response_fields.description:
(Account-only) Lists the current list of domains
explicitly allowed by this account. (Note: this list will not take effect unless
CSP is explicitly enabled on this account)

operations.summary: Get current settings for account or course
operations.notes: Update multiple modules in an account.

response_fields.name: inherited
response_fields.description: Whether the current CSP settings are inherited from a parent account.

response_fields.name: settings_locked
response_fields.description: Whether current CSP settings can be overridden by sub-accounts and courses.

response_fields.description:
If enabled, lists the currently allowed domains
(includes domains automatically allowed through external tools).

response_fields.description:
(Account-only) Lists the automatically allowed domains with
their respective external tools

apis.description:
Either explicitly sets CSP to be on or off for courses and sub-accounts,
or clear the explicit settings to default to those set by a parent account

Note: If "inherited" and "settings_locked" are both true for this account or course,
then the CSP setting cannot be modified.

operations.summary: Enable, disable, or clear explicit CSP setting
operations.notes:
Either explicitly sets CSP to be on or off for courses and sub-accounts,
or clear the explicit settings to default to those set by a parent account

Note: If "inherited" and "settings_locked" are both true for this account or course,
then the CSP setting cannot be modified.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
If set to "enabled" for an account, CSP will be enabled for all its courses and sub-accounts (that
have not explicitly enabled or disabled it), using the allowed domains set on this account.
If set to "disabled", CSP will be disabled for this account or course and for all sub-accounts
that have not explicitly re-enabled it.
If set to "inherited", this account or course will reset to the default state where CSP settings
are inherited from the first parent account to have them explicitly set.

apis.description:
Either explicitly sets CSP to be on or off for courses and sub-accounts,
or clear the explicit settings to default to those set by a parent account

Note: If "inherited" and "settings_locked" are both true for this account or course,
then the CSP setting cannot be modified.

operations.summary: Enable, disable, or clear explicit CSP setting
operations.notes:
Either explicitly sets CSP to be on or off for courses and sub-accounts,
or clear the explicit settings to default to those set by a parent account

Note: If "inherited" and "settings_locked" are both true for this account or course,
then the CSP setting cannot be modified.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
If set to "enabled" for an account, CSP will be enabled for all its courses and sub-accounts (that
have not explicitly enabled or disabled it), using the allowed domains set on this account.
If set to "disabled", CSP will be disabled for this account or course and for all sub-accounts
that have not explicitly re-enabled it.
If set to "inherited", this account or course will reset to the default state where CSP settings
are inherited from the first parent account to have them explicitly set.

apis.description: Can only be set if CSP is explicitly enabled or disabled on this account (i.e. "inherited" is false).

operations.summary: Lock or unlock current CSP settings for sub-accounts and courses
operations.notes: Can only be set if CSP is explicitly enabled or disabled on this account (i.e. "inherited" is false).

parameters.name: settings_locked
parameters.description: Whether sub-accounts and courses will be prevented from overriding settings inherited from this account.

apis.description:
Adds an allowed domain for the current account. Note: this will not take effect
unless CSP is explicitly enabled on this account.

operations.summary: Add an allowed domain to account
operations.notes:
Adds an allowed domain for the current account. Note: this will not take effect
unless CSP is explicitly enabled on this account.

apis.description:
Adds multiple allowed domains for the current account. Note: this will not take effect
unless CSP is explicitly enabled on this account.

operations.summary: Add multiple allowed domains to an account
operations.notes:
Adds multiple allowed domains for the current account. Note: this will not take effect
unless CSP is explicitly enabled on this account.

apis.description: Must be called on a root account.

operations.summary: Retrieve reported CSP Violations for account
operations.notes: Must be called on a root account.

apis.description: Removes an allowed domain from the current account.

operations.notes: Removes an allowed domain from the current account.
